item.title: HUAWEI Nova Y70
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
• 6000 mAh Large Battery HUAWEI nova Y70’s 6000 mAh battery only needs to be charged twice a week, giving you more boom, and less bust!
  • 22.5W HUAWEI SuperCharge 22.5 W HUAWEI SuperCharge will give 3 hours of video on just 10 minutes of juice!
  • HD Splendor on Full Display With its 6.75-inch FullView display, and 90.26% screen-to-body ratio, HUAWEI nova makes watching blockbusters more immersive.
  • 48 MP AI Triple Camera HUAWEI nova Y70 smartphone comes with a triple AI camera setup that’s as adaptable as it is awe-inspiring.
  • Store More, Stress Less With 64 GB to play around with, and 512 GB Micro SD expandable storage, you can live life to the fullest, without having to max out your phone!
item.content:encoded:
Brand HUAWEI
Model name NOVA Y70
Wireless carrier Unlocked for All Carriers
Operating system EMUI 12.0
Cellular technology 4G
Memory storage capacity 4 GB
Connectivity technology Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, USB
Colour Emerald Green
Screen size 6.75 Inches
Wireless network technology

item.title: HUAWEI Nova 11 Pro
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
• 【6.88 mm Ultra-thin Design】Experience the comfort with our ultra-thin flat-edged screen design, measuring only 6.88 mm thin and weighing a mere 168 g! Enjoy an immersive viewing experience thanks to our ultra-narrow side bezels of approximately 1.59 mm, which offers a wider display and greater visual delight.
  • 【60 MP Front Ultra Wide Portrait Camera】HUAWEI nova 11 smartphone’s front camera supports 60 MP 4K Ultra-Wide Camera
  • 【50 MP Ultra Vision Photography】Thanks to the 50 MP capability, RYYB Colour Filter Array and the XD Portrait algorithm, your portraits will stand out with sharpness and vividness even at night.
  • 【 66 W HUAWEI SuperCharge Turbo】 With the 4500 mAh large battery and 66 W HUAWEI SuperCharge Turbo, the phone can be fully charged in just 31 minutes. Say goodbye to long charging times and hello to more time enjoying your HUAWEI nova 11.
  • 【6.7-inch Fexible OLED Display】Featuring HUAWEI’s first Display Turbo technology, the 6.7-inch flexible OLED display delivers exceptional performance. With support for HDR photo display and AI-enhanced ultra-HD image quality, every detail is brought to life.
item.content:encoded:
Brand HUAWEI
Model name Nova 11
Wireless carrier Unlocked for All Carriers
Operating system EMUI 13
Cellular technology 4G
Memory storage capacity 256 GB
Connectivity technology Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, USB
Colour Black
Screen size 6.7 Inches
Wireless network technology

item.title: HUAWEI Mate 50 Pro
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
• Ultra Aperture XMAGE Camera: It auto-adjusts the aperture to meet the needs of any moment, and Professional mode gives you 10 different aperture sizes to choose from, so that you can tailor the blur and depth of field in your latest masterpiece
  • Durable Kunlun Glass: Powerful Kunlun Glass keeps the screen out of harm’s way, as demonstrated by the first-ever five-star glass drop resistance certification from Switzerland’s SGS. The overall drop resistance is boosted 10 times
  • Up to 6-Metre Water Resistance: HUAWEI Mate 50 Pro is built to handle whatever life sprays its way, with IP68-rated splash, water, and dust resistance, and an incredible 6 metres of water resistance on the Orange version
  • Performs Like a Champ: Go the distance with your favourite films and games, thanks to a 4700 mAh large capacity battery, 66 W Wired Multi-channel HUAWEI SuperCharge⁠ and 50 W Wireless HUAWEI SuperCharge
  • Personal, Productive, and Private: Smart Service Widgets, Convenient SuperHub, Enhanced Privacy and Security
item.content:encoded:
Brand HUAWEI
Model name Mate 50 Pro
Wireless carrier Unlocked for All Carriers
Operating system EMUI 13.0
Cellular technology 4G
Memory storage capacity 256 GB
Connectivity technology Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, USB, NFC
Colour SILVER
Screen size 6.74 Inches
Wireless network technology LT

item.title: HUAWEI P60
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
• This exquisite smartphone adopts a unique Pearl Texture Design1 that makes it shine through like a timeless ornament, and gives a distinct pattern on each phone with its shimmering Rococo Pearl exterior, letting elegance utterly express every step of the way.
  • The Ultra Lighting Telephoto Camera lets you take pics that look pristine from whatever the distance, whatever the time.
  • The Ultra Lighting Main Camera, boasting an F1.4–F4.0 auto-adjustable physical aperture, helps produce marvellous images day and night with its unprecedented full-path light capturing capabilities.
  • The phone’s Kunlun Glass receives the five-star glass drop-resistance certification from Switzerland’s SGS.
  • Turn Turbo mode on to boost the battery to 50% in just 10 minutes, with 88 W HUAWEI SuperCharge.
  • The 6.67-inch Quad-Curve LTPO screen gives you a smooth grip and immersive view with its 1-120 Hz adaptive refresh rate.
  • The signature Rococo Pearl advocates romance and elegant style. Each piece is unique.
item.content:encoded:
Brand HUAWEI
Model name HUAWEI P60 Pro
Wireless carrier Unlocked for All Carriers
Operating system HarmonyOS 3.1
Cellular technology 4G
Memory storage capacity 512 GB
Connectivity technology Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, USB, NFC
Colour Rococo Pearl
Screen size 6.67 Inches
Wireless network technology L
